name: nasadailyphoto
description: A React.js based demo and portfolio web app displaying using a NASA web API, environment variables, a CSS framework, React Router, HTML 5, JavaScript, CSS, Google Fonts, and FontAwesome icons, and more. React.js built for production then deployed to a simple Apache based shared web host as a means of testing various React.js deploy methods. Enjoy! Demo site is http://nasadailyphoto.ryanhunter.ca/ .
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle: SystemsVanguard | Web: www.ryanhunter.org | Location: Toronto ON Canada | Email: Ryan@ryanHunter.org
